catalog_script_client.name: Set service selection vis & mandatory

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_a82237a5eb2142105204f635cad0cd5b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Constituent Connect">bfe53424479902504f6574fc416d4337</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:114369bd471942104f6574fc416d4357</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Set service selection vis & mandatory </name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

    if (g_form.getValue('new_or_existing_service') == '1') {
        if (newValue == '1') {
            //This is a service request
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_services', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_information_requests', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_license_or_permit', false);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_services', true);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_information_requests', false);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_license_or_permit', false);
        } else if (newValue == '2') {
            //This is an info request
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_services', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_information_requests', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_license_or_permit', false);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_services', false);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_information_requests', true);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_license_or_permit', false);
        } else if (newValue == '3') {
            //This is a license or permit request
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_services', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_information_requests', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_license_or_permit', true);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_services', false);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_information_requests', false);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_license_or_permit', true);
        }
    }

    return;

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jspirko</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-14 03:32:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a82237a5eb2142105204f635cad0cd5b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set service selection vis & mandatory </sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="15-Minute Service MVP" source="x_snc_15_minute_se">9c753ca0479902504f6574fc416d43d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="15-Minute Service MVP">9c753ca0479902504f6574fc416d43d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_a82237a5eb2142105204f635cad0cd5b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jspirko</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-14 04:35:00</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
